sentences.english: Li Yu and Aina Jushi is the best writer In the short vernacular fiction novel writing In the Qing Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 李渔和艾衲居士是清代最出色的短篇白话小说作家。

sentences.english: People know that you can't promise something for nothing.
sentences.chinese: 人们都知道不能空口说白话。

sentences.english: Our publication house plans to publish a series of modern versions of the classics.
sentences.chinese: 出版社计划陆续出版一些古代经籍的白话译文。

sentences.english: The trend of Chinese literature experienced a sudden change. Narrating in colloquial language replaced chanting in classical Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 中国文学潮流遭遇了急变，白话叙事替代文言咏叹。

sentences.english: Chapter Two analyses CUV s influence upon the promotion of Mandarin.
sentences.chinese: 第二章分析和合本对中国白话推广的推动作用。

sentences.english: The essentials of attaining mental tranquility that expressed, in common words, are the ways of practice.
sentences.chinese: 所谓养神之道，用白话讲就是修行的方法。

sentences.english: Yes, till modern history, modern vernacular Chinese is popular.
sentences.chinese: 是啊，到了近现代就是白话文了。

sentences.english: Chapter four is discussed to the artful way of making up the judge images in the vernacular courtcase stories.
sentences.chinese: 第四章探讨白话公案小说中判官形象塑造的艺术手法。

sentences.english: Of course, should not empty talk, there is truth must be proved.
sentences.chinese: 当然不能空口讲白话，必须有事实加以证明。

sentences.english: These theories proposed for the emergence of the vernacular to provide guidance.
sentences.chinese: 这些理论的提出为白话文的出现提供了指导。

sentences.english: The born weakness of vernacular poems is the unrefined language.
sentences.chinese: 白话诗语言欠精练，是与生俱来之病。

sentences.english: He discussed in detail the eight benefits of vernacular , full proof-based vernacular.
sentences.chinese: 他详细论述白话八点益处，充分论证白话为本。

sentences.english: He discussed in detail the eight benefits of vernacular , full proof-based vernacular.
sentences.chinese: 他详细论述白话八点益处，充分论证白话为本。

sentences.english: There are special rigin and environment of the Free Poetry and Free Verse Revolution in China.
sentences.chinese: 白话诗和新诗革命具有特殊的生成语境。

sentences.english: The principal of Jinan First Normal School was a New side figure who first adopted schoolbook written in the vernacular.
sentences.chinese: 一师校长是新派人物，首先采用了白话文教科书。

definition: old language/the Classics/Classical Chinese as a literary model, esp. in Tang and Song prose/Classical Chinese as a school subject

Mandarin (common language)/Putonghua (common speech of the Chinese language)/ordinary speech
